is_fixed_price.description: Filter for fixed price vs auction products

standard_formats_only.description: Only return products accepting IAB standard formats

min_exposures.description: Minimum exposures/impressions needed for measurement validity

start_date.description: Campaign start date (ISO 8601 date format: YYYY-MM-DD) for availability checks

end_date.description: Campaign end date (ISO 8601 date format: YYYY-MM-DD) for availability checks

budget_range.description: Budget range to filter appropriate products

countries.description: Filter by target countries using ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes (e.g., ['US', 'CA', 'GB'])

regions.description: Filter by regions/states using ISO 3166-2 subdivision codes. Format: '{country}-{subdivision}' (e.g., 'US-NY', 'GB-SCT', 'CA-ON', 'DE-BY'). Only returns products that support region-level targeting in these areas.

metros.description: Filter by metro area. Only returns products that support metro-level targeting in these areas.

code.description: Code within the system (e.g., '501' for NYC in Nielsen DMA)

postal_areas.description: Filter by postal area. Only returns products that support postal-level targeting in these areas.

system.description: Postal code system. System name encodes country and precision.

code.description: Postal code value (e.g., '10001' for us_zip, 'SW1' for gb_outward, 'K1A' for ca_fsa)

required_axe_integrations.description: Filter to products executable through specific agentic ad exchanges. URLs are canonical identifiers.

required_features.description: Filter to products from sellers supporting specific protocol features (e.g., 'content_standards', 'inline_creative_management')
